name: Silver Whistle
description:
Under emperor’s command, adjutant Chuanfang Shuei travels with the army to war in the deserts of the West. Unfortunately, army generals use this opportunity to fill their pockets and expeditionary force is defeated. During the fight Chuanfang Shuei got cursed and lost her ability to fight. With the help of her subordinates, she escapes to the nearby neutral city of Harmudis, filled with soldiers, bandits and masters of martial arts. It seems something big is going on in the city.
Chonghua Zeng, the Duke of Harmudis, saves Chuanfang Shuei just in time. To repay for saving her life, Chuanfang Shuei starts helping Chonghua Zeng, while trying to find a way to recover her ability to fight.
Chuanfang Shuei believes in the good in people, she always helps others as first priority. Even if danger lurks around every corner, she still insists on helping people.
“Although Chonghua Zeng is a pervert, he needs my help. And I will repay him for saving my life at the same time… ”. She has another opinion about those responsible for losing the war “Generals embezzled army supplies, just let me finish with my debt and think about it next.”

Gameplay
Take control of a knight Chuanfang Shuei to find treasure for the Duke of the city. You may meet enemies during your adventures, but don’t worry, Chonghua Zeng will save you when you are in danger.

You can use weapons to easily get through mazes and find treasure. But weapons are expensive, maybe you can ask your lord for them or earn money by yourself. There are some opportunities to earn money in the night city.

Features
Rich H-CG and events.
Day and night system.
Explore the city in the desert.
Rare weapons to help in battle.
Interesting story about relationship between two main characters.
Supports Chinese, English and Japanese languages.
